# Health Tracker PWA Project Setup Instructions

## Project Overview
Mobile-first Progressive Web App for health and meal tracking optimized for iPhone with "Add to Home Screen" capability.

## Completed Steps
- âœ… Created .github directory with copilot-instructions.md

## Remaining Steps
- [ ] Scaffold Next.js 14 project with TypeScript
- [ ] Configure PWA manifest and service worker
- [ ] Set up Tailwind CSS and UI components
- [ ] Create meal tracking components
- [ ] Implement local storage
- [ ] Install dependencies and verify build
- [ ] Create development task and launch

## Tech Stack
- Next.js 14 (App Router)
- TypeScript
- Tailwind CSS
- shadcn/ui components
- PWA capabilities (manifest + service worker)
- Local Storage for data persistence

## Key Features
- Daily meal tracker with 7 time slots
- Color-coded compliance tracking
- Date navigation
- Photo upload for meals
- Weekly summary view
- Export functionality
- Offline support
